Requirements on iterators for parallel_sort

Requirements on value type T of RandomAccessIterator for parallel_sort: 
  •  void swap( T& x, T& y )
    Swaps x and y 
  •  bool Compare::operator()( const T& x, const T& y )
    True if x comes before y;
